Write: Write is an editor where you could type and format your text and ideas.
Writefeatures: You can also play with colors , fonts and images and share your experience with your friends
TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Write activity. The Write activity is a basic word processor with a simple interface for children. Like a standard word processor, you will be able to format your text using buttons in the toolbar
TutoNetworkContent: Click here to share the activity so other users on the network could co-edit the text with you
TutoForegroundContent: Click here to change the color for the text
TutoBackgroundContent: Click here to change the background color for the text
TutoFormatContent: Click here to change the text style. It will allow you to use bold, italic, underline or strike
TutoParagraphContent: Click here to change paragraph alignement. You could align text to the right, to the left or to the center
TutoListContent: Click here to create an ordered or unordered list
TutoIncreaseContent: Click here to increase font size
TutoFontContent: Click here to change font for the text: Arial, Comic Sans MS, Verdana, ...
TutoDecreaseContent: Click here to decrease font size
TutoInsertContent: Click here to insert into the document an image from Journal
TutoUndoContent: Click here to undo last action
TutoRedoContent: Click here to redo last action
TutoCopyContent: Click here to copy selected text
TutoPasteContent: Click here to paste copied text
TutoExportContent: Click here to export your document in the Journal as a TXT, PDF, DOC or ODT file
TutoCanvasContent: Here is the place where you can type, edit text and insert images. By default there is a sample text but feel free to remove it and begin to create!
TutoSuperContent: Click here to format text as a superscript: i.e. above the current line of text
TutoSubContent: Click here to fortmat text as a subcript: i.e. under the current line of text
